titleStmt.title: A Full and true relation of a horrid and detestable conspiracy against the lives, estates, and reputations of three worthy members of this present Parliament, which God long preserve

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Identified on UMI microfilm as Wing F2315A Entry cancelled in 2nd ed.; item is post-1700.
John Tredenham "... incurred odium through associating with Poussin, the French agent, 1701"--cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
